join: nber_subcategory left outer join nber_copy on nber_subcategory.id=nber_copy.subcategory_id left outer join nber_category on nber_copy.category_id=nber_category.id
left outer JOIN patent on nber_copy.patent_id=patent.patent_id

left outer join assignee_entity on nber_copy.patent_id=assignee_entity.patent_id left outer join assignee_nber_subcategory on assignee_entity.assignee_key_id=assignee_nber_subcategory.assignee_id and nber_copy.subcategory_id=assignee_nber_subcategory.subcategory_id

left outer join inventor_entity on nber_copy.patent_id=inventor_entity.patent_id left outer join inventor_nber_subcategory on inventor_entity.inventor_key_id=inventor_nber_subcategory.inventor_id and nber_copy.subcategory_id=inventor_nber_subcategory.subcategory_id
left outer join application on nber_copy.patent_id=application.patent_id
left outer join ipcr on nber_copy.patent_id=ipcr.patent_id
left outer join cpc_entity on nber_copy.patent_id=cpc_entity.patent_id
left outer join uspc_entity on nber_copy.patent_id=uspc_entity.patent_id

left outer JOIN patent as patent_year on nber_copy.patent_id=patent_year.patent_id left outer join nber_subcategory_patent_year on patent_year.year=nber_subcategory_patent_year.patent_year and nber_copy.subcategory_id=nber_subcategory_patent_year.subcategory_id
left outer join wipo_entity on nber_copy.patent_id=wipo_entity.patent_id

left outer join government_interest on nber_copy.patent_id=government_interest.patent_id left outer join patent_govintorg on nber_copy.patent_id=patent_govintorg.patent_id left outer join patent_contractawardnumber on nber_copy.patent_id=patent_contractawardnumber.patent_id left outer join government_organization on patent_govintorg.organization_id=government_organization.organization_id
left outer join pctdata on pctdata.patent_id=nber_copy.patent_id
